step.cmd: Find the DITA map Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap in the ePublisher Express Document Manager.
Right click on the Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap and select Explore Location.
expand/collapse sections instructions Open the DITA file t_create_your_fist_expandcollapse_section.xml in your preferred editing tool.
In the <Title> element assign an output class of ExpandCollaspe. Your Title element should now look like this: <Title outputclass="ExpandCollapse">.
Generate the HTML5 document set using the ePublisher Express Trial project.
Navigate to this page in the generate HTML5 document set to verify the Expand/Collapse section was create.
Return to the ePublisher Express Trial guide.
